description: Creates a project in the specified portal.

parameters.name: portalId
parameters.description: The ID of the portal in which to create the project.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: A friendly name for the project.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the project. For more information, see Tagging your IoT SiteWise resources in the IoT SiteWise User Guide. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: projectArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the project, which has the following format.
